Hi, need help in sheet creation for heritrix 2.0.0RC1

I want to create a s=
heet which basically does the following things:

1. One seed is given and i=
t should crawl within this particular 
domain only
2. Should fetch only MIM=
E type text/html pages which matches a 
particular RegExp
3. Should write o=
nly MIME type text/html pages which has StatusCode 
of 200 and matches a pa=
rticular RegExp

ed to make
